name: Nexmo + Google Cloud Speech
description: Demo applicaiton of using Google Cloud Speech API with Nexmo Websockets to perform realtime transcription in multiple languages.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Nexmo Application Private Key. Has to start with -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----

HOSTNAME.description: Hostname where you are running the webserver listening on port 8000

WSHOSTNAME.description: Hostname where you are running the webserver listening on port 8001
